scripts.test.android: npm r && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build android && ns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm r && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build ios && ns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns run android
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && ns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && ns run android
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && ns run ios
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && ns run android
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove nativescript-auth0 && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && ns clean && cd ../src && npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock
